data_table.description: Bone Densitometry (BMD) Hip Scan data file. The BMD data files include results from the DXA scans performed at the Clinical Centers participating in the WHI Osteoporosis substudy. Participants with valid results from a hip scan are included in the data files. These data have been analyzed and monitored by the UCSF DXA Quality Assurance Center before being transferred to the CCC.

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: WHI dbGaP Subject ID

variable.name: HIPVTYP
variable.description: Hip scan visit type

variable.name: HIPVY
variable.description: Hip scan visit year
variable.comment: Visit year for which this BMD scan was collected.

variable.name: HIPDAYS
variable.description: Hip scan days from randomization/enrollment

variable.name: HIPSDSCN
variable.description: Side of the Hip Scan

variable.name: HIPAREA
variable.description: Area of the Total Hip (cm squared)

variable.name: HIPBMC
variable.description: BMC of the Total Hip (grams)

variable.name: HIPBMD
variable.description: BMD of the Total Hip (g/cm squared)

variable.name: HIPBMDCOR
variable.description: BMD of the Total Hip (corrected) (g/cm sq)
variable.comment: Corrected BMD value is based on recommendations from the UCSF quality assurance report. For details see the Data Preparation document.

variable.name: HIPTSCOR
variable.description: Total Hip BMD T-score
variable.comment: Total Hip BMD T-score The T-score represents the number of standard deviations the participant's BMD is above or below the mean for a healthy 30 year old woman of the same race/ethnicity. Based on HIPBMDCOR 'BMD of the Total Hip (corrected)'.

variable.name: HIPNKAREA
variable.description: Area of the Hip Neck (cm squared)

variable.name: HIPNKBMC
variable.description: BMC of the Hip Neck (grams)

variable.name: HIPNKBMD
variable.description: BMD of the Hip Neck (g/cm squared)

variable.name: HIPNKTSCOR
variable.description: Hip Femoral Neck BMD T-score
variable.comment: Hip Femoral Neck BMD T-score The T-score represents the number of standard deviations the participant's BMD is above or below the mean for a healthy 30 year old woman of the same race/ethnicity. Based on HIPNKBMD 'BMD of the Hip Neck'.

variable.name: HIPTRAREA
variable.description: Area of the Hip Trochanter (cm squared)

variable.name: HIPTRBMC
variable.description: BMC of the Hip Trochanter (grams)

variable.name: HIPTRBMD
variable.description: BMD of the Hip Trochanter (g/cm squared)

variable.name: HIPINAREA
variable.description: Area of the Hip Intertrochanter (cm sq)

variable.name: HIPINBMC
variable.description: BMC of the Hip Intertrochanter (grams)

variable.name: HIPINBMD
variable.description: BMD of the Hip Intertrochanter (g/cm sq)

variable.name: HIPWDAREA
variable.description: Area of the Hip Wards Triangle (cm sq)

variable.name: HIPWDBMC
variable.description: BMC of the Hip Wards Triangle (grams)

variable.name: HIPWDBMD
variable.description: BMD of the Hip Wards Triangle (g/cm sq)

variable.name: HIPSID
variable.description: Hip scanner ID
